    Guide d'utilisation du package silvia

    Function reference

    All functions

    download_bd_foret()
    Download bd foret layer on the territory, for the selected years, using 'happign' package The function returns nothing but store gpkg files in the "data->arep" folder
    download_impermability_layer()
    Download impermability layers on the territory, for the selected years, using 'happign' package The function returns nothing but store raster files in the "data->copernicus" folder
    download_territory_files()
    Download territory files
    get_apigouv_insee_codes()
    Apigouv insee codes
    get_carbon_flows()
    Get carbon flows
    get_carbon_flows_balance()
    Get carbon flows balance
    get_carbon_stocks()
    Get carbon stocks
    get_forest_flows()
    Retrieve the carbon flows in the forest, using the BD foret 2
    get_land_use_changes()
    Get land use changes
    get_total_carbon_stocks()
    Compute total carbon stocks at a certain date, of a chosen region. Four flows categories : stocks in biomass in forest, stocks in biomass out forest, stocks in soils, and total cabon stocks
    plot_carbon_flows()
    Plot carbon flows
    plot_carbon_stocks()
    Plot carbon stocks
    plot_forest_flows()
    Plot forest flows
    plot_land_use_changes()
    Plot land use changes
    select_territory()
    Select territory
    setup_path()
    Setup Path
    test_apicarto_commune()
    Test apicarto_commune function Check if the insee code exists
    update_epcis()
    Update old epcis found in aldo to the new classification
